name: A Classic Horror Game
description:
A Classic Horror Game is a first person 3D horror adventure.

Features:

  • Explore a strange, little world
  • Use the items to unlock the paths
  • Symbols keep you safe...

Controls:

[W][A][S][D] = Movement
[E] = Pick objects
[LMB] = Use objects
[CTRL] = Crouch
[ESC] = Pause
